questions.title: Two Whats And A Wow: Holiday Wrap Battle
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to learn the category for today!

questions.question: What in the world are the rules of the game?

choices.answer: You select the made up WHATS?!
You select the one true WOW!
Wrap a present in under a minute!
Catch snowflakes as they fall from the sky!

questions.question: Which of the following facts about the holiday season is the one true WOW?

choices.answer: The largest group of people wearing holiday sweaters happened at a concert.
Arctic foxes change the color of their fur around the holiday season!
Artificial snow can be made with oobleck!

questions.title: And the true wow is...
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to see which was the winning WOW!

questions.question: Operation Snowtacular STEAM Challenge! What do you predict will happen?!

choices.answer: I will be able to make enough fake snow to make a tiny snowperson!
I will be able to make enough fake snow to make a snowball!
My fake snow will look and feel like real snow!
My fake snow won't feel like real snow, but it will be fun to play with!
